name: Inside Man
description: A police detective, a bank robber, and a high-power broker enter high-stakes negotiations after the criminal's brilliant heist spirals into a hostage situation.

name: The Pianist
description: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

name: Uprising
description: Jews rise up in the Warsaw Ghetto against the Nazis in 1943.

name: Schindlers List
description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazi Germans.

name: Chosen
description: An unassuming young lawyer leads a fight against the Nazis near the end of World War II.

name: Die Unsichtbaren
description: Four young Jews survive the Third Reich in the middle of Berlin by living so recklessly that they become invisible

name: A Walk to Remember
description: The story of two North Carolina teens, Landon Carter and Jamie Sullivan, who are thrown together after Landon gets into trouble and is made to do community service.

name: Erin Brockovich
description: An unemployed single mother becomes a legal assistant and almost single-handedly brings down a California power company accused of polluting a city's water supply.

name: How to Train Your Dragon
description: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

name: The Other End of the Line
description: An employee at an Indian call-center travels to San Francisco to be with a guy she falls for over the phone.

name: Colombiana
description: A young woman, after witnessing her parents' murder as a child in Bogota, grows up to be a stone-cold assassin.

name: 12 Angry Men
description: Twelve men must decide the fate of one when one juror objects to the jury's decision.

name: The Pelican Brief
description: A law student uncovers a conspiracy, putting herself and others in danger.

name: Veronica Guerin
description: An Irish journalist writes a series of stories about drug dealers.

name: How to Rob a Bank
description: Caught in the middle of a bank robbery, a slacker and a bank employee become the ones who arbitrate the intense situation.
